responses: Hello! Welcome to MITU Skillologies. How can I help you regarding our courses or team today?
Hi there! How may I assist you with your learning journey today?
Our Data Science & AI course (8 weeks) covers Machine Learning, Neural Networks, Deep Learning, and AI Ethics. It's designed to help you transform businesses through data with real-world projects.
The Python Programming course (4 weeks) takes you from basics to system-level programming. It covers functional programming, file I/O, and is a perfect foundation for automation.
Our Linux Administration course (6 weeks) includes training in Linux Essentials, User Management, Kernel Programming Basics, and Shell Scripting.
The Cloud Computing course (5 weeks) focuses on Virtualization and OpenStack architecture, covering storage, security, and infrastructure management.
Our IoT & Raspberry Pi course (6 weeks) bridges electronics and software. You'll work with sensors, actuators, and protocols like MQTT using Raspberry Pi and Arduino.
The Full Stack Web Dev course (8 weeks) covers HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, PHP, MySQL, and CMS like WordPress to build professional, responsive websites.
You can reach us at +91 9960163010. Our offices are in Pune (Navi Sangvi) and Nashik (Mhasrul). Email: contact@mitu.co.in
MITU Skillologies is a professional training institute focused on Data Science, AI, and Open Source technologies, empowering individuals through hands-on learning.
